q1: Croatia's team is on the rise and getting better and better each year, I think they'll be a high competitor in the next years. But can they win anything?
a2: They are very good, they had some good wins but some devastating losses !
q3: Is Croatia actually playing better this year than they did last year?
a3: Of course every year they get better.
q4: Who do you think the best player on the team is?
q5: if ivan rakitic is the best croatian player
a5: I also believe that Rakitic is the best player in Croatia.
